General.Name: Anhui Xinli Finance Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Xinli Finance Co., Ltd. provides various financial products and services. It offers small loans, financing guarantees, P2P online loans, financial leasing, and pawn services, as well as software and information technology and supply chain services. The company was formerly known as Anhui Chaodong Cement Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Anhui Xinli Finance Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hefei, China.
